files.content:
# Plano — Remoção de cache no-store

Arquivos com `cache: 'no-store'` detectados:

- apps/web/src/lib/auth-admin-job.ts
- apps/web/src/components/financeiro/MissingPricingAlert.tsx
- apps/web/src/components/secretaria/MatriculasListClient.tsx
- apps/web/src/components/secretaria/TurmaDetailClient.tsx
- apps/web/src/components/secretaria/TurmaForm.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/documentos/[publicId]/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/financeiro/fecho/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/professor/frequencias/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/professor/notas/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/components/escola/onboarding/AcademicSetupWizard.tsx
- apps/web/src/components/escola/settings/SettingsHub.tsx
- apps/web/src/components/layout/klasse/AppShell.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/secretaria/(portal-secretaria)/rematricula/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/escola/[id]/admin/configuracoes/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/escola/[id]/admin/turmas/page.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/escola/[id]/admin/configuracoes/avaliacao-frequencia/AvaliacaoFrequenciaClient.tsx
- apps/web/src/app/escola/[id]/financeiro/configuracoes/precos/usePrecosLogic.ts

Ação recomendada:
- Revisar caso a caso e substituir por cache adequado (revalidate/force-cache) ou remover fetch desnecessário.

title: Plano de revisão do audit trail

files.content:
# Plano — Audit Trail

Ação recomendada:
- Validar cobertura before/after nas mutações críticas (financeiro/matrículas).
- Confirmar campos mínimos: actor, action, entity, before, after, ip, created_at.
